directions: Place steaks in a nonmetallic dish, and pour the whiskey over the meat; turn to coat.  Cover, and marinate in the refrigerator for 8 hours.
Brush grate with oil, and arrange steaks over hot grate.  Cook for 6 to 10 minutes. Turn, and cook until done to your liking, another 6 to 10 minutes.
title: Big M's Whisky Soaked Beef Rib Steaks
